Occupation History:
Diana Lina Koch is a 66 year old retired Investment Director from Germany. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Diana Lina Koch's first role was as a Family Office Manager at Deutsche Bank AG, where she worked diligently from 1983 to 1988 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Investment Director at Commerzbank AG in 1989, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 670000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She owns 3 exceptional properties: flat located in Mannheim, valued at approximately 1,150,000.00 EUR, flat located in Frankfurt am Main, valued at approximately 1,237,000.00 EUR, condo located in Essen, valued at approximately 1,420,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Mannheim, Frankfurt am Main and Essen.
She does not have any inheritances.
